title:
How can I get a copy of an old newspaper.  Electronic would work, but in newspaper format. I\'d like an article from the spring of this year.



-Angela
text:
Do you know the exact date of the newspaper you need? We have some
copies - but not all - going back a year. After that, I would have to
refer you to our online edition or the New Hanover County Public
Library, downtown, which keeps our microfilm.
